Articles.Content:
This is how my KSP ingame looked back in 1.3.1:

Note how allll the the panels are semi-transparent (not the windows like Persistent Trails and Graphotron tho). I don't see this in 1.4.5, and in fact for some reason in 1.3.1 the transparency didn't affect all panels until I installed Ferram's last official FAR release. This is what it used to look like:

Anyone else experience this in 1.3.1 and have any idea how to bring the transparency back in 1.4.5? I think it may have been a bug but I kinda liked it

my God it's full of panels!

I'll see myself out.

However I'm sure there is a mod that changes the look of the UI.

Peace.
